last_assistant_message:
## Task Complete

**Task**: Write Tests & Implement Organization Service (MS-11)
**Status**: Completed

**What was done**:
- Created Prisma schema with 7 models: Department, Position, Incumbent, OrgNode, ReportingLine, Transfer
- Implemented 3 NestJS modules: Position (CRUD + RBAC), OrgChart (tree query), Transfer (workflow)
- Wrote 49 unit tests across 4 test suites — all passing
- Created seed data from mock-org-structure.js
- Integration tests scaffolded (require database)

**Files created** in `src/services/organization-service/`:
- `prisma/schema.prisma`, `prisma/seed.ts`
- `src/position/` — service, controller, module, DTOs
- `src/org-chart/` — service, controller, module  
- `src/transfer/` — service, controller, module, DTOs
- `src/prisma/`, `src/app.module.ts`, `src/main.ts`
- `test/unit/` (4 spec files), `test/integration/` (1 spec file)

**Verification**: `npx jest --testPathPattern="test/unit"` → 4 suites, 49 tests passed

## Task Complete

**Task**: #8 - Write Tests & Implement Organization Service (MS-11)
**Status**: Completed

**What was done**:
- Created full Organization Service at `src/services/organization-service/` with NestJS
- Package setup with correct tsconfig paths, jest config referencing tsconfig.test.json
- Prisma schema: 6 models (Department, Position, Incumbent, OrgNode, ReportingLine, Transfer)
- 3 feature modules: Position, Transfer, OrgChart with controllers, services, DTOs
- Seed data from mock org structure data

**Test Results**: **49 tests passing** across 4 unit test suites + 1 integration test suite (requires DB)

**Files changed**: 24 new files in `src/services/organization-service/`

**Verification**: `npx jest --testPathPattern="test/unit"` — 4 passed, 49 tests passed
